https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fz1zW0PEpbLUpt152W30WpGsOEa.jpg 1732, in the era of Yoshimune Tokugawa. West Japan suffers from a severe famine. Three years after wards, it appeared as though calm had been restored to the domain, but there is word that Jyuzo Matsumiya, the sword fighting instructor sent by the shogunate, is taking some suspicious actions. Bushido
